Green & Thomas algorithm for sampling from decomposable graph distributions Schema¶

http://github.com/felixleopoldo/benchpress/schema/config.schema.json#/definitions/greenthomas

Green & Thomas algorithm for learning decomopasble graphs. Source: Green, P. J., & Thomas, A. (2013). Sampling decomposable graphs using a Markov chain on junction trees. Biometrika, 100(1), 91-110.
